result.reason: When importing CSV connections, the password for containers is incorrectly assigned to the inherited ConnectionInfo.Password property instead of the ContainerInfo.ContainerPassword property, preventing proper folder protection.
result.approach: Modify CsvConnectionsDeserializerMremotengFormat.cs to distinguish between ConnectionInfo and ContainerInfo when assigning the password during CSV import. If the record is a ContainerInfo, assign the password to ContainerPassword. Also, ensure the Password property in AbstractConnectionRecord is correctly typed as string, as seen in the analysis.
